name: spectacle-cli
description: CLI for the Spectacle Presentation Framework

scripts.build:examples-cli-md: cd examples/cli-md && node ../../bin/spectacle/cli.js --title "Spectacle CLI + MD Example" --src slides.md -a build
scripts.build:examples-cli-mdx: cd examples/cli-mdx && node ../../bin/spectacle/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Babel + Custom Theme Example" -t theme.js -f true --action build --output dist
scripts.build:examples-cli-mdx-babel: cd examples/cli-mdx-babel && node ../../bin/spectacle/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Babel + Spectacle Slide Example" -q template.js --action build
scripts.build:examples: builder concurrent --buffer build:examples-cli-md build:examples-cli-mdx build:examples-cli-mdx-babel build:examples-loader-mdx
scripts.start:cli-md: cd examples/cli-md && node ../../bin/spectacle/cli.js --title "Spectacle CLI + MD Example" --src slides.md --port 3100
scripts.start:cli-mdx: cd examples/cli-mdx && node ../../bin/spectacle/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Custom Theme Example" -t theme.js -f true -p 3000
scripts.start:cli-mdx-babel: cd examples/cli-mdx-babel && node ../../bin/spectacle/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Babel + Spectacle Slide Example" -q template.js -p 3001
scripts.start:examples: builder concurrent --log-level=info start:cli-md start:cli-mdx start:cli-mdx-babel start:loader-mdx
